attributes.action: Agree to allowing trolls to live under every bridge in London.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As has been pointed out by the rather brilliant Mark Thomas, there are way too many goats in out nations great capitol.  In order to alleviate this insiduous menace, I petition that every London bridge be allocated a minimum of one (1) Troll, more for the larger bridges, to help control the Capra hircus menace.

Thank you.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
